The Ministry of Agriculture and Forestry () is a government ministry of the Republic of Turkey, responsible for agriculture and forestry.
General Directorate of Forestry
It is responsible for forests in Turkey. This includes reforestation efforts, which are important to combat climate change in Turkey.
See also
*AgroEurasia
*List of agriculture ministries
